trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivati gli oggetti in un controllo che funge da procedura guidata.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The WizardStepCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe WizardStepCollection viene utilizzata per archiviare e gestire una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derivati gli oggetti in un controllo che funge da procedura guidata, ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>controllo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardStepCollection class for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controllo utilizza la classe WizardStepCollection per relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways you can access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in the WizardStepCollection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Item%2A> property to directly access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diversi modi per accedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-agli oggetti di WizardStepCollection derivati:-utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Item%2A>proprietà per accedere direttamente a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice in base zero specifico derivato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metodo per creare un enumeratore che può essere utilizzato per scorrere la raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the WizardStepCollection collection into an <xref:System.Array> object.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.CopyTo%2A>metodo per copiare il contenuto della raccolta WizardStepCollection in un <xref:System.Array>oggetto.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato da alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il metodo Add di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato da alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato da insieme in una posizione di indice specifico, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivato l'oggetto da aggiungere al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivata passato <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato alla raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The AddAt method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo AddAt aggiunge il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato alla raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato da alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to insert <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice in corrispondenza del quale inserire <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivato l'oggetto da aggiungere al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivata passato <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetti derivati dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the Clear method to remove all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Clear per rimuovere tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-gli oggetti derivati dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After the Clear method removes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects from the collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Count%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection has a value of zero.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dopo il metodo rimuove il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetti derivati dalla raccolta, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Count%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>raccolta contiene un valore pari a zero.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> raccolta contiene un oggetto specifico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Contains per determinare se un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato è contenuto nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object before performing a task, such as removing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene comunemente utilizzato per verificare l'esistenza di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato prima di eseguire un'attività, ad esempio la rimozione di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to find in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato da trovare nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object is found in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivata oggetto si trova nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: wizardStep is .
trans-unit.target: wizardStepis .

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia tutti gli elementi da un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme a una matrice unidimensionale compatibile di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref> oggetti, a partire dall'indice specificato nella matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo CopyTo per copiare il contenuto della raccolta nella matrice specificata in base zero.

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi vengono copiati a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: After the items are in an array, you can use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Dopo gli elementi in una matrice, è possibile utilizzare la sintassi della matrice per accedere agli elementi di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è inoltre possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metodo per creare un enumeratore che può essere utilizzato per accedere agli elementi nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects that receives the items copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice in base zero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref> gli oggetti che riceve gli elementi copiati dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which the array starts receiving the copied items.
trans-unit.target: Posizione nella matrice di destinazione in cui la matrice inizia a ricevere gli elementi copiati.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetti derivati di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> del controllo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà Count per determinare il numero di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetti derivati il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Count viene comunemente utilizzata quando si scorre la raccolta per determinare il limite superiore.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetti derivati di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implemented object that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implementato l'oggetto che può essere usato per scorrere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-nella raccolta di oggetti derivati.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implemented object that contains all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implementato l'oggetto che contiene tutte le <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetti derivati di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina il valore di indice che rappresenta la posizione dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivato l'oggetto nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object in the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo IndexOf per determinare l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto nell'oggetto derivato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato non è presente nella raccolta, il metodo restituisce -1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato da cercare nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: If found, the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in within the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Se viene trovato, l'indice in base zero della prima occorrenza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato da passato all'interno di corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> raccolta; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivata passato <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object into the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato nella raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di inserimento aggiunge il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato alla raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>metodo per aggiungere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato alla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato da alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Insert method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method perform essentially the same function.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inserire il metodo e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>metodo svolgono essenzialmente la stessa funzione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the Insert method is called, it simply passes the `wizardStep` and `index` parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene chiamato il metodo di inserimento, passa semplicemente il `wizardStep` e `index` parametri per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.AddAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato da inserire il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived objects in the collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-derivati oggetti nella raccolta possono essere modificati.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection can be modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> raccolta può essere modificata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso alla raccolta è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata dal <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>l'interfaccia e viene eseguito l'override per restituire sempre `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla proprietà IsSynchronized, vedere la <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>proprietà dell' <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interfaccia</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato dalla raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object at the specified index location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà dell'elemento per recuperare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato in derivato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme utilizzando la notazione di matrice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> oggetto da recuperare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Remove per rimuovere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from a specified location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metodo per rimuovere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato da una posizione specificata nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato da rimuovere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object passed in is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivata passato <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object from the collection at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato dalla raccolta in corrispondenza della posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo RemoveAt per rimuovere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-derived object from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile rimuovere uno specifico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>-oggetto derivato dalla raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>-derived object to remove.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>-oggetto derivato da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto restituito in questa implementazione è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>oggetto stesso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla proprietà SyncRoot, vedere il <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia tutti gli elementi da un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme in una matrice unidimensionale, iniziando dall'indice specificato nella matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array> that receives the items copied from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: In base zero <xref:System.Array>che riceve gli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> insieme.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: Posizione nella matrice di destinazione in corrispondenza del quale iniziare a ricevere il contenuto copiato.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to append to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>da aggiungere alla fine della raccolta.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Posizione nella quale è inserito il nuovo elemento.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la raccolta contiene l'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>da individuare nella raccolta.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Object> is found in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.Object>è presente nel <xref:System.Collections.IList>; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina il valore di indice che rappresenta la posizione dell'oggetto specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The object to search for in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da cercare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice dell'oggetto specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified object in the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce l'oggetto specificato nella raccolta in corrispondenza della posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert the object into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice in corrispondenza del quale inserire l'oggetto nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da inserire nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta ha dimensioni fisse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta ha dimensioni fisse. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: myCollection[index].
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di accedere a un elemento specifico nella raccolta utilizzando la seguente sintassi: myCollection [index].

trans-unit.source: The index of the object to get from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice dell'oggetto da ottenere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The object to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da recuperare.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da rimuovere dalla raccolta.
